response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending a special offer of $15,000. I am confident that you will find its value far exceeds this price. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
